story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: That applies to these great inventors as well.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
The ideas and technology formed by their young
talent will eventually wither away. They won’t
wait for us forever.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But what about the relationship between people
and Pokémon?
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
It can flourish right now, without having to rely on
sync stones, wouldn’t you say?
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: Surely we can take our time with that.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Right now, we ought to be researching energy use
that could save our future.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Hey, I don’t think Mr. Rose would use sync stones
maliciously.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Would it really be that bad for him to be in charge
of the sync stones?
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
The inventions people create will light up
the future.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: That itself isn’t a bad thing.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_1500_10: Why do you all seem unhappy?
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_1600_10:
You’re all passionate about inventing things, but
you don’t seem excited at all.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_1800_10: Mr. Rose’s request involves a lot of restrictions.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_2000_10:
We’ve no time to play around. We’ve got to save
our future as soon as possible!
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
And to do that, we must eliminate anything that’s
useless!
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_2400_10: Your ideals aren’t necessary right now.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_2500_10:
That is, not for the future a millennium from now
that I envision.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_2600_10:
It seems we’re unable to create what
Mr. Rose wants...
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_2800_10: I’m afraid I don’t think we can be of further help.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_2900_10: I’m sorry, but please excuse us...
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_3200_10:
With the way you’re going about things, you’ll end
up limiting sync stones’ potential.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_3300_10: That seems clear from your conversation.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_3500_10: Your way of doing things shuts other people down.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_3600_10:
And with that, your valued partners will
drift away.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_3700_10:
Your options will start to run out, until eventually
you hit a dead end.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Do you really think you can save “the future a
millennium from now” like that?
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_4000_10:
My experience and accomplishments that made
Macro Cosmos a success are proof my methods
work.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_4200_10:
If you still don’t understand, even after this
conversation, there’s only one option left.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_4400_10:
Then instead of using words, we can face each
other heart-to-heart!
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_4500_10:
Are you suggesting we settle this with a
Pokémon battle?
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_4700_10:
For you to understand the importance of connecting
with others...
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_4800_10: I challenge you to a group battle, Chairman!
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_4900_10: I don’t intend to change my mind, even if I lose.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_5100_10:
But I suppose I’ll accept, if that’s what will
satisfy you.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_5200_10:
And if I win against you, I can spread word of my
ideas on a larger scale.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_5300_10: However, I have you as my opponent.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_5400_10:
I’m clearly at a disadvantage when it comes to
Pokémon battles.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_5500_10:
You wouldn’t mind if I brought along some
“supporters”...
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_5700_10: Bring whoever you’d like. Victory will be mine.
story_galar_02_05000/2401_1001_5800_10: We’ll change your mind with our shining brilliance!
